channel.title: "SafeWorld" MineCraft server
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i965.photobucket.com/albums/ae136/runescapeharr/SAFEWORLD3.png[/img]
Server staff:
TomScape BETA Si Force Magma828
Current Member list:
Krackkid yuio9 LilXCj Rip4d noobs are ftw Kono-chan
This server is named SafeWorld. It is mainly for building but for the moment PK'ing is enabled, and hopefully shall remain so but this may vary in the future. Only 5 people will be given the IP for now, this may change in the future but for now that is the way that it will work.
As I don't know much more info on the server, I'll leave it at that. Post if you wish to know the IP, and Tom will let you know if you're in.
This is kind of a bad post, but hopefully more information will be added to it soon.
Server is pretty much:
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,483958.0.html
No longer exists!

item.title: "SafeWorld" MineCraft server
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:151, topic:379668”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=475510.msg3484367#msg3484367 date=1296430593]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=475510.msg3484344#msg3484344 date=1296429537]

Space is a problem in the area we are in I just realised as we are surrounded on 3 sides by mountains. If you’s clear the mountains or hilly areas feel free to expand your city to whatever lengths you desire. If you even need help don’t hesitate to ask me, and I’ll be sure to help you out in between working on my current structure.
[/quote]Wait, you can’t go past the mountains? Or are you like trying to build one main area?

No he’s saying that the mountains are in the way, and if we want to clear them away we can do whatever basically.
[/quote]Yea but I’m asking why you couldn’t go over the mountains and then build a larger city

We did. Someone’s griefed it. And Tom does random large tnt detonations outside of the main city regardless of what’s in the way. So of your city just happens to be hit then… Well, that sucks.

Basically, we’re not allowed to create cities out of spawned blocks unless it’s an official city. Tom doesn’t want cities far away from the main one, which is why we can only build in the section he gave us. We can build far away if we don’t spawn items, but then we could only manage to build a shit one and it’d be even worse when it gets griefed.

I want to make a city (and possibly more) because it makes the server more interesting. Each city can be different, and can be linked by the trains etc. We’re not making it to show off or compete, we just want to make the server better for everyone.

Anyway, (si force or tom) are you saying that we can have 60x60 for the city if we actually clear the surrounding mountains for the space? Or that we have to go further than the mountains? If not, then I’m still happy to just work on the main city instead. Imo it’d just be more interesting with more cities.[/quote]

Clear the mountains away and you can build all you want, is basically what they said. Provided it’s not huge or anything.

Read full topic

item.title: "SafeWorld" MineCraft server
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Kono-chan, post:148, topic:379668”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=475510.msg3484344#msg3484344 date=1296429537]

[quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=475510.msg3484340#msg3484340 date=1296429360]

Space is a problem in the area we are in I just realised as we are surrounded on 3 sides by mountains. If you’s clear the mountains or hilly areas feel free to expand your city to whatever lengths you desire. If you even need help don’t hesitate to ask me, and I’ll be sure to help you out in between working on my current structure.
[/quote]Wait, you can’t go past the mountains? Or are you like trying to build one main area?

No he’s saying that the mountains are in the way, and if we want to clear them away we can do whatever basically.
[/quote]Yea but I’m asking why you couldn’t go over the mountains and then build a larger city

We did. Someone’s griefed it. And Tom does random large tnt detonations outside of the main city regardless of what’s in the way. So of your city just happens to be hit then… Well, that sucks.[/quote]
Basically, we’re not allowed to create cities out of spawned blocks unless it’s an official city. Tom doesn’t want cities far away from the main one, which is why we can only build in the section he gave us. We can build far away if we don’t spawn items, but then we could only manage to build a shit one and it’d be even worse when it gets griefed.

I want to make a city (and possibly more) because it makes the server more interesting. Each city can be different, and can be linked by the trains etc. We’re not making it to show off or compete, we just want to make the server better for everyone.

Anyway, (si force or tom) are you saying that we can have 60x60 for the city if we actually clear the surrounding mountains for the space? Or that we have to go further than the mountains? If not, then I’m still happy to just work on the main city instead. Imo it’d just be more interesting with more cities.

Read full topic

item.title: "SafeWorld" MineCraft server
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:142, topic:379668”]What is it with you people?

I said you cannot have it 6000x6000 because people need room as well, not once did I say anything of the above. Not just you want to build near the main city.

You’re simply asking for things we don’t have, clear all the mountains and sure as hell you can have some more space! You have 35x35 now. As David said, I encourage you to build better buildings than the main city.

Consider it a competition.[/quote]

I hardly said anything… I just wanted like 60x60, lol. I even said I’d just help out with the main city instead…

Read full topic

item.title: "SafeWorld" MineCraft server
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

What is it with you people?

I said you cannot have it 6000x6000 because people need room as well, not once did I say anything of the above. Not just you want to build near the main city.

You’re simply asking for things we don’t have, clear all the mountains and sure as hell you can have some more space! You have 35x35 now. As David said, I encourage you to build better buildings than the main city.

Consider it a competition.

Read full topic
